title: OUR Lord is risen from the dead

verses.text: OUR Lord is risen from the dead; Our Jesus is gone up on high! A captive host he led captive To the bright portals of the sky.
There his triumphal chariot waits, And angels chant the solemn lay; Lift up your heads, ye heavenly gates; Ye everlasting doors, give way.
Loose all your bars of massy light, And wide unfold the beauteous scene; He claims these mansions as his right; Receive the King of glory in.
Lo! His triumphal chariot waits, And angels chant the solemn lay; Lift up your heads, ye heavenly gates; Ye everlasting doors, give way.
Who is this King of glory? Who? The Lord, of glorious power possessed; The King of saints and angels too; God over all, forever blest.
